content.raw:
Yes, I see 1.1GB large `state.tlog` \(SQLite format 3\). OK, so you mean to query it directly - thanks for hint. If you know the query I will try it directly.

BTW for robot A: position \(63.403, -113.644, Z\), and sim times: 484s-573s, 588s-611s, 657s-741s

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/2097966981-virtual-trap-bug-urban-practice1-part3.jpg)
again the robot is stuck approximately 1m from the wall … on multiple places.
